title: Dígbòórà. Ìgbàgbọ́. Ìṣẹ́lẹ̀tù.
content: Learning with Duolingo is fun, and research shows that it works! With quick, bite-sized lessons, you’ll earn points and unlock new levels while gaining real-world communication skills.

title: backed by science
content: We use a combination of research-backed teaching methods and delightful content to create courses that effectively teach reading, writing, listening, and speaking skills!

title: stay motivated
content: We make it easy to form a habit of language learning with game-like features, fun challenges, and reminders from our friendly mascot, Duo the owl.

title: personalized learning
content: Combining the best of AI and language science, lessons are tailored to help you learn at just the right level and pace.
